name: Scared Stiff
description:
Scared Stiff

Goal:

In Scared Stiff your goal is to kill zombies and get the highest score you can.

Controls:

Move Mouse - Rotate Player

Left Click - Shoot 

Reloading - Automatically done every 15 shots over the period of one second

Credits:

Alan Tadiello - Programing, Art, Concept, Sound and Music Design, and UI Design
